response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which we believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we estimate its worth to be around $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
